known_issues: Requested contact email appears to be malformed (uses comma instead of dot): "hello.quickbeeagency,com"

existing_features.title: Update the site contact email address from the current value in `frontend/src/config/site.ts` (`siteConfig.contact.email`) to exactly `hello.quickbeeagency,com`, and ensure all UI locations that use `siteConfig.contact.email` (including mailto links and any displayed email text) reflect this new value.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update contact email from hello@leadflow to hello.quickbeeagency,com
